user_query: I want to explore different surf destinations around the world. Could you provide me with a list of countries with surf breaks and their corresponding surf forecasts? It would be great to have detailed forecasts for specific surf breaks as well.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of countries that are known for surf breaks.
For each country, retrieve a list of surf breaks available.
Fetch surf forecasts for each surf break identified in Step 2.
Compile all surf forecasts along with their corresponding surf breaks and countries into a comprehensive report.
